explains: n. 共存；和睦相处；（计算机设备的）兼容性
wordGroup: incentive compatibility 激励相容；剌激的协调性
compatibility test 适应性实验；可适性试验
backward compatibility 向后兼容；反向兼容性
compatibility condition 兼容性条件，协调性条件

sentences.en: As a result of their compatibility, Haig and Fraser were able to bring about wide-ranging reforms.
sentences.cn: 由于意趣相投，黑格和弗雷泽能带来广泛的改革。

sentences.en: Guide dog training schools work very hard to match handlers with guide dogs according to the compatibility of their personalities.
sentences.cn: 导盲犬训练学校非常努力地根据导盲犬的性格匹配训犬员。

sentences.en: Investigate the biological compatibility of artificial material of polyglycolic acid with peripheral nerve tissue.
sentences.cn: 探索人工生物降解材料聚乙醇酸纤维与周围神经组织的生物相容性。
